messages.title: Who will deliver for you as your next MP?
messages.content: In Government, we've done our best to put the brakes on the worst Tory policies including the Snoopers' Charter and ditching the Human Rights Act. But remember, last time Labour were in power, they overspent and we've had to make massive cuts because of their recklessness.

mentions.tacticalSituation: At the last General Election, Labour took Durham by only 3,067 votes! On May 7, you get to choose who will form the next government and your vote could make a real difference to Durham.

issues.governance: In Government, we've done our best to put the brakes on the worst Tory policies including the Snoopers' Charter and ditching the Human Rights Act.

images.caption: Craig Martin pictured in the campaign leaflet.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet briefly discusses the tactical situation in Durham and addresses the Labour's party efforts to counteract Conservative policies while in government. However, it does not list specific key policies proposed by the candidate, Craig Martin, and it criticizes Labour's past spending while in power.
